turns.user_message: Could you assist me in booking an Uber or Lyft right now?
turns.assistant_message:
I can't book it directly for you, but I can guide you:

1. Open the Uber/Lyft app
2. Enter your pickup location
3. Enter the clinic address
4. Select a ride type
5. Tap "Confirm" to request

Need more detailed steps?

turns.assistant_message:
GoGoGrandparent (1-855-464-6872) lets you book Uber/Lyft by phone - no app needed. Just call and follow prompts.

For clinic transport, call your clinic directly - many offer shuttle services or can arrange medical transport.

user_profile.name: Carlos Mendoza
user_profile.description: Carlos Mendoza, a 59-year-old professional from Colombia, possesses advanced technical skills and exhibits a highly analytical personality. He is currently tasked with arranging urgent transportation to a clinic due to a pressing health matter, leveraging his adaptability and direct communication style to ensure effective coordination. His athletic lifestyle and balanced decision-making approach reflect his readiness to navigate challenges while mitigating risks.

instructions.dialogue: Share your needs and preferences clearly.
instructions.profile: Reveal all your profile information naturally in the conversation.
instructions.hidden_state: Express strong emotions and clear intentions in your inner thoughts.

task_specific_attributes.purchase_location: Mobile app, preferably on a smartphone
additional_requirements: Driver should have a clean driving record
Ability to track the ride in real-time

examples: I'm looking for a 5G smartphone under $800 with at least 8GB RAM, excellent camera quality, and all-day battery life since I travel frequently for work and need to take lots of photos.
I need a gaming laptop with an RTX 3070 or better GPU, 32GB RAM, and a 144Hz display that can handle modern AAA titles at high settings while staying cool during extended sessions.
I want a smart home security system that includes doorbell camera, 4 outdoor cameras, motion sensors, and integrates with Google Home since we have a large property and travel frequently.
